MemberSignature.Value: public void ApplyLayout (int Layout, object ChartType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ApplyLayout(int32 Layout, object ChartType) cil managed

param.name: Layout
param.span: 1 到 10 之间的一个整数，用于指定要应用于图表的布局的类型。

span.span: An integer from 1 through 10 that specifies the type of layout to apply to the chart.

summary.span: 应用功能区上显示的布局。

span.span: Applies the layouts shown on the Ribbon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Layout`参数的值对应于功能区上 "**设计**" 选项卡上 "**图表布局**" 组中的可用选项。The values of the `Layout` parameter correspond to the available options on the **Chart Layouts** group on the **Design** tab on the Ribbon. 选择图表时, "**设计**" 选项卡可用。The **Design** tab is available when you select a chart. 每种图表类型都有自己的一组布局选项。Each type of chart has its own set of layout options. 例如, 饼图的布局选项不同于柱形图的布局选项。For example, the layout options for a pie chart are different from the layout options for a column chart. 如果要从不同的图表类型应用布局, 可以使用`ChartType`参数来指定`Layout`参数将引用的图表类型。If you want to apply a layout from a different chart type, you can use the `ChartType` parameter to specify the chart type that the `Layout` parameter will refer to. 例如, 如果您有一个柱形图, 并且想要从折线图应用布局, 请将值传递给该`ChartType`参数。For example, if you have a column chart and you want to apply a layout from a line chart, pass the value to the `ChartType` parameter. 布局仅添加可用于该特定图表类型的图表元素。The layout only adds chart elements that are available for that particular chart type. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information about optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例应用了可用于`Chart_1`图表的图表类型的第10个布局。The following code example applies the tenth layout that is available for the chart type of the `Chart_1` chart. 此外, 该示例使用方法来应用进一步的布局更改: 将图表标题的样式设置为居中, 并位于图表网格区域内, 为水平轴添加标题, 并为垂直轴添加旋转的标题。In addition, the example uses the method to apply further layout changes: setting the style of the chart title to be centered and to lie inside the chart grid area, adding a title for the horizontal axis, and adding a rotated title for the vertical axis. 若要运行此代码示例, 您必须将名称`Chart_1`为的聚集柱形二维图表添加到默认工作表。 `Sheet1`To run this code example, you must add a clustered column two-dimensional chart with the name `Chart_1` to the default sheet `Sheet1`. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWorkBook_Additional#17](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/trin_excelworkbook_additional/cs/ThisWorkbook.cs#17)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWorkBook_Additional#17](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/trin_excelworkbook_additional/vb/ThisWorkbook.vb#17)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据值`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType`指定的选项, 使用方法修改图表的元素。Use the method to modify an element of the chart according to the options specified by the `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType` values. 例如, 若要隐藏表图例, 请将值`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType.msoElementLegendNone`传递给方法。For example, to hide the table legend, pass the value `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType.msoElementLegendNone` to the method. 在选择图表时, 可以使用此方法执行的操作对应于功能区的 "**布局**" 选项卡上的以下按钮:The operations you can perform by using this method correspond to the following buttons on the **Layout** tab of the Ribbon when a chart is selected: - **标签**组中的所有按钮。All buttons in the **Labels** group. - **轴**组中的所有按钮。All buttons in the **Axes** group. - **分析**组中的所有按钮。All buttons in the **Analysis** group. - **背景**组中的**绘图区**、**图表墙**和**图表基底**按钮。The **Plot Area**, **Chart Wall**, and **Chart Floor** buttons in the **Background** group. ## Examples 下面的代码示例应用了可用于`Chart_1`图表的图表类型的第10个布局。The following code example applies the tenth layout that is available for the chart type of the `Chart_1` chart. 此外, 该示例使用方法来应用进一步的布局更改: 将图表标题的样式设置为居中, 并位于图表网格区域内, 为水平轴添加标题, 并为垂直轴添加旋转的标题。In addition, the example uses the method to apply further layout changes: setting the style of the chart title to be centered and to lie inside the chart grid area, adding a title for the horizontal axis, and adding a rotated title for the vertical axis. 若要运行此代码示例, 您必须将名称`Chart_1`为的聚集柱形二维图表添加到默认工作表。 `Sheet1`To run this code example, you must add a clustered column two-dimensional chart with the name `Chart_1` to the default sheet `Sheet1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将属性设置为`true` , 以在指定的数据透视图上显示所有字段按钮。 Set the property to `true` to display all field buttons on the specified PivotChart. 将属性设置为`false`可隐藏所有字段按钮。Set the property to `false` to hide all field buttons. 此属性对应于 Excel 中 "分析" 选项卡的 "**字段按钮**" 下拉列表中的 "**全部隐藏**" 命令, 可在选择数据透视图时使用。 The property corresponds to the **Hide All** command on the **Field Buttons** drop-down list of the **Analyze** tab in Excel, which is available when a PivotChart is selected. > [!NOTE] > 此属性显示在面向的[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]Excel 2007 项目中的 IntelliSense 中。This property appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是, 不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此属性。However, this property cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
